entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 11:30 AM NST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 09 March 2023
